text:
SYSTEM ADMINISTRATOR AT MAXMIND / WALTHAM, MA / REMOTE / FULL TIME / https://www.maxmind.com/en/home

To view the job description and apply please click on the link here: https://jobs.lever.co/maxmind/bf978fb8-7340-4c9e-85a1-b354d7...

MaxMind does not currently sponsor employment visas.

RESUMES WITHOUT COVER LETTERS WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED. Please include a link to your GitHub account or portfolio if you have one. We want to know about you!

Note: We can only consider applications from the US states of Massachusetts, Minnesota, Montana, North Carolina, and Oregon, and anywhere in Canada. Relocation to any of the aforementioned locations is welcome.
